attributes.action: Insist the Government  give the people of the UK a general election.
attributes.additional_details: It is glaringly obvious how damaging this whole affair has become, the peoples of the UK insist on settling the argument with a general election so we can finally put an end to this "zombie government" before Christmas.
attributes.background: The country cannot afford this current state of affairs to continue any longer, the Brexit  question must be answered definitively so the country can continue to flourish.I believe that a General Election will settle the argument once and for all, because it will be a proxy "second referendum".
